class.name: SoftDynamicBody3D
class.description: A deformable physics body. Used to create elastic or deformable objects such as cloth, rubber, or other flexible materials. [b]Note:[/b] There are many known bugs in [SoftDynamicBody3D]. Therefore, it's not recommended to use them for things that can affect gameplay (such as a player character made entirely out of soft bodies).

method.name: add_collision_exception_with
method.description: Adds a body to the list of bodies that this body can't collide with.

method.name: get_collision_exceptions
method.description: Returns an array of nodes that were added as collision exceptions for this body.

method.name: get_collision_layer_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member collision_layer] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: get_collision_mask_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member collision_mask] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: get_point_transform
method.description: Returns local translation of a vertex in the surface array.

method.name: is_point_pinned
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if vertex is set to pinned.

method.name: remove_collision_exception_with
method.description: Removes a body from the list of bodies that this body can't collide with.

method.name: set_collision_layer_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member collision_layer], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: set_collision_mask_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member collision_mask], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: set_point_pinned
method.description: Sets the pinned state of a surface vertex. When set to [code]true[/code], the optional [code]attachment_path[/code] can define a [Node3D] the pinned vertex will be attached to.

members.member: The physics layers this SoftDynamicBody3D [b]is in[/b]. Collision objects can exist in one or more of 32 different layers. See also [member collision_mask]. [b]Note:[/b] Object A can detect a contact with object B only if object B is in any of the layers that object A scans. See [url=$DOCS_URL/tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.html#collision-layers-and-masks]Collision layers and masks[/url] in the documentation for more information.
